Reviews.Title: Excellent Computer
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is one of the greatest laptops I have ever used. The speed of the processor is amazing. I also love the addition of a Blue-Ray player with a graphics card to match.  Great for gaming and watching videos on Netflix and YouTube.  Totally worth the extra money.  Highly recommend and I couldn't be happier.  The only thing it didn't have was Microsoft office which I needed for my college coursework, but I easily downloaded that on the computer and had to pay like $75 for the really good version.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i7 3720QM 2.6 GHz
16 GB DDR3
1000 GB 5200 rpm Hard Drive
17.3-Inch Screen, NVIDIA GeForce GTX675M
Windows 8 Professional, 6-hour battery life
ProductInfo.Name: CybertronPC Boss NB3172A 17.3-Inch Laptop
